Text: PaytonHello I just wanted to say I hope your weekend went well Payton is growing like a weed He is now tickalish He also has learned how to scream now thats about all he does He has a walker and he loves to sit in it and just talk away He is such a happy baby everyone enjoys him and loves to see him hes so pleasant

PaytonI just wanted you to know that we made it home safe this weekend Payton is doing very well He is so smart and happy He sent you a package on Firday since he did not get to see you Thursday night he hopes you enjoy it

Fw Payton Original Message From To Sent Friday September AM Subject Payton Payton had somethings to give you last night He was sorry he did not see you or your family He was all cleaned up and dressed in one of his new shirts when we got the message We will put what he had for you in the mail

PaytonJoe just wanted to give you and update on how Payton is He is growing like a weed he is now lbs and ozs His hair is getting thicker I had to trim his hair over his ears because it was getting long enough to tuck it behind his ears He is learning very fast he can move really well in his walker when he is on smooth flooring and he is praticing everyday to sit up and crawl it want be long He still talks alot and never cries he is such a wonderful baby He can turn around on his back in a turn and he can roll across the room if nothing is in his way Wel he is ready for me to get him out of his bed I better go He looks forward to visiting with you soon

Settlement out of courtPer our conversation today you wanted to know what I propose there are only a few things I would like us to follow the law as closely as possible I want per Texas law you to pay what your requested in child support so in the future there will be no discrepency Paid through the Clerk of Court in Harris County I would like to follow the visitation guidelines that Miram provided to me I am willing to work with you to make it more convenient with Paytons best interest in mind I still propose that you pay my attorney fees During your Orlando visit on July th with Payton you stated You wanted to do whatever you needed to do to make me happy because then you knew Payton would be happy This would make me happy and it would help me to provide for Payton the best I can I am willing to cooperate with your family in scheduling visits within reason with Payton In Orlando on July th you asked if I could bring Payton to New Orleans for your Uncles weddingI told you would think about it After careful consideration I feel that at Paytons age that will not be a wise decision These are the issues that I can think of right now Once you provide me with a proposal I will let you know if anything else comes to mind I feel by both parties following the Texas law it will work in everyones best interest

Re PaytonJoe I recieved your email I will read it over and give a response to it tomorrow This is what I propose to you regarding payment for the nine months Since you did not incur any medical expenses knowing what they could of been I would like Attorney fees both Florida Texas not including Texas fees for and forward to finalize our case Back child support for months Half of what expenses I incurred getting ready for Payton crib swing stroller car seat etc etc I know that incurredmore expenses than this going back forth to doctor lost wages at work etc Please let me know whst your thoughts are Tonya Original Message From Stepenovitch Joe Joe NRONcom To Sent Tuesday July PM Subject FW Payton Tonya Please read this standard possession order This will only be used if we dont agree to our own terms Ill call you tomorrow when I get the other forms Have a wonderful night and tell my son I love him and I miss him with all of my heart please give him a kiss for me Joe Original Message From Jonda Stowell ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESJondaStowellCjlsfullenweiderEcomE NRONcom Sent Tuesday July PM To Stepenovitch Joe Subject Payton Dear Joe I forgot the attachment Here it is Jonda L
